data: PED NEPH Renal Biopsy Pre Procedure (Day of Procedure) (Multiphase) - Prototype
Inpatient nurse to initiate Pre Procedure phase of this plan
If BP exceeds the 95% percentile based on the patients height, age and sex
Once morning bloodwork with TACrolimus level is completed, patient should take all medications with a few sips of water only
Except for Medication, Except for Sips of Water, No food after midnight on night before procedure. May drink clear fluids after midnight until 2 hours prior to procedure
If/when CBC, INR or PTT not done within past 6 weeks, then nurse to order CBC, INR and PTT STAT
Obtain urine pre-procedure and save aliquots for gross hematuria
